title: Create CAR MODEL Node
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to be able to create car models\
So I can fill gaps in the database
description:
# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (201)
* a simple JSON with the following properties of the newly created node:
  * id: integer
  * name: string

**Unhappy path**

* negative HTTP status code (400, 422)
* a plain text response stating the problem

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* validations (except check for mandatory fields)
  * duplicate IDs
  * invalid data types
* creating multiple car models at once (bulk create)
* meta information
* versioning information
* auth / security
* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business Logic)**

* the car model is successfully created when provided with valid data
* an error when the provided data was not valid
* the car model is not created in error case
